payload.name: declarative-reconciliation-loops
payload.title: Declarative reconciliation loops: desired vs observed state
payload.formal: controllers compute (diff(desired, observed)) and apply corrections until convergence.
payload.apm2_mapping: reducers are “observed state,” PRDs/RFCs/tickets are “desired state,” and gates are reconciliation checks. Extend reconciliation to infrastructure: policy bundles, schema registries, key distribution.
